ygData.subject: Re: OT: Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I find this really sad. During beta enchanters were very rare (well, high level enchanters, anyways), but always a welcome addition. My dream party combo
ygData.messageBody:
>Just wanted to comment that my other character is an enchanter, and I
>seriously have to disagree here. I have NEVER grouped, soloed the entire
>way, and have levelled about twice as fast as my Bard.
>Enchanters start to suck at higher levels, because the resistance system is
>messed up, so enchanters are getting large numbers of resists vs. green
>creatures currently.
>
>Just my two cp
>
>
>Talies the Wanderer
>http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
>

I find this really sad. During beta enchanters were very rare (well, high
level enchanters, anyways), but always a welcome addition. My dream party
combo would include an enchanter for sure.
I think my favorite mix for a full party is something like: A paladin or
ranger or warrior (preferably a ranger or paladin), Cleric, Bard, Enchanter,
Wizard, Druid. 2 spellchuckers, 2 healers, and 1 and 1/2 tanks =)
I think it works very well.

Sartori of Kelethin
